title: 3D Game-Based Water Quality Concept Curriculum: Advanced Learning for Administrators

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic scientific knowledge and environmental management experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining virtual simulations via digital devices and offline discussions, focusing on enhancing field-applicable water quality management skills for corporate environmental safety managers.

learning_goals: Learners can explain causes of water pollution and purification processes with over 85% accuracy through 3D game-based simulation.
Learners can design water quality improvement solutions via in-game problem-solving tasks and propose plans for applying them to real-world cases.
Learners enhance their ability to establish water management strategies through knowledge sharing with peers in collaborative game activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
